DOC.brief_summary: Study efficacy contraceptive patch 2100 healthy woman one year .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Study Agile AG200-15 Transdermal Contraceptive Delivery System
DOC.detailed_description: AG200-15 use 4-week ( 28-day ) treatment cycle : patch apply replace every 7 day 3 consecutive week , follow 1-week `` patch-free '' period .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , sexually active woman risk pregnancy seek use hormonal contraception least 1 year Ability demonstrate willingness participate adhere study protocol Known suspect pregnancy Lactating woman Anticipates use condom form backup contraception study History dermal sensitivity medicate patch ( nicotine ) bandage , surgical tape , etc . Has contraindication combine estrogenprogestin contraceptive use Any disease may worsen hormonal treatment ( cardiovascular , liver , metabolic ) Smoker 35 year old
